title: Basic Combat
content: Combat in 100 Souls is turn-based and uses a unique 1d6 - 1d6 system for determining results.

title: Skill Checks
content: To perform a skill check, roll 1d6 - 1d6 and add your skill. Doubles allow a reroll, 6/6 is a crit success, 1/1 is a crit failure.

title: Feat Overview
content: Feats represent special bonuses and rule-breaking mechanics your character can acquire through play or background.
